nodes.text: A Fleebog was one of four Fleebog emissaries sent by his species to kidnap the Ewok Princess Kneesaa a Jari Kintaka from her home in Bright Tree Village in 3 ABY. The Fleebogs shrank the Ewok to the size of a member of the Fleebog species with a damsel flower and brought the princess to their lair to help them fight a creature known as the ra-lugg.

The Fleebog species appears in Ewoks 11, which was written by Dave Manak and first published by Marvel Comics in 1987. The illustrations, by Warren Kremer, depict a party of four Fleebogs kidnapping the princess; however, Manak provides no distinguishing characteristics for the characters, making them impossible to distinguish from one another.
